title: TUESDAY 5/18 - NO QB CONTROVERSY IN CHICAGO
itunes:title: TUESDAY 5/18 - NO QB CONTROVERSY IN CHICAGO
description:
Justin Fields (0:07) impressed at Bears rookie minicamp, but head coach Matt Nagy (0:34) says there's no question who is QB1 in Chicago. Same goes for Tua Tagovailoa (1:15) in Miami. Head Coach Brian Flores (1:37) talks about Tua's development in year two. Carson Wentz (1:58) now the man in Indy and Frank Reich (2:25) has Wentz's back. Ryan Kerrigan (2:55) joins the competition, while the Broncos (3:09) make NFL history

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
